title: Euw
body: Wieso ist Eu West gerade down ? und wie lange ?

replies.body:
Zitat:
Network Operations – 4:35 AM
Ranked queues are disabled in preparation for the upcoming patch at 05:00 GMT.
2:55 AM
Network Operations — At 03:30 GMT, Ranked queues will be turned off in preparation for the patch at 05:00 GMT.
Last Tuesday at 11:32 PM
Network Operations — On 14/05/15, starting at 03:30 UK Time (02:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.9. At 05:00 UK Time (04:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

Network Operations – 05/05/2015
Hello Summoners,
Wanted to give you an update on the ARAM Skin Boost issue. We recently turned this feature on with the 5.8 deploys, and shortly after started receiving a handful of tickets for players who were on the team of someone who purchased the skin boost not receiving a random skin (IP was received though).
After doing some digging, our engineers found a bug in the code where some messages around status of Skin Boosts weren't able to communicate with each other inside our platform hardware. We are in the process of fixing the bug, but due to the nature of the fix will be holding off on deploying it until the next release (5.9). Sorry for the inconvenience!
04/29/2015
Network Operations — The Skin Boost system has been temporarily disabled.

Nachzulesen auch hier: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw

ka aber is echt nervig
die Server spacken auch grad und hauen einen oft aus dem game raus und verweigern dann den reconnect

Hey KaputzenMungo

EUW bekommt grade den Patch 4.9 aufgespielt und deshalb sind die Server offline ;)

LG Sebastian  -  SebPlayZz

Fear is the path to the dark side of the Force  -  Master Yoda
